DOC.brief_summary: This study assess investigational medication patient chronic renal insufficiency ( pre-dialysis ) secondary hyperparathyroidism .
DOC.brief_title: Study Secondary Hyperparathyroidism Chronic Renal Insufficiency Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients must chronic renal insufficiency ( predialysis ) Have normal creatinine clearance Have elevate parathyroid hormone level Pregnant nursing Heart attack last 3 month .
